Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its high-quality craftsmanship and unique features, we believe it's worth more than its face value. For this exceptional offering, I am proposing a special introductory price of $95. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a product that could potentially save you time, money, or simply add value to your life. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
